main event: Two separate UFO sightings were reported in Brunswick, Maine, involving one object on April 18, 1966, and three objects on April 22, 1966.
interesting points: On April 18, 1966, two witnesses observed a single object for 4-5 seconds, perceived to be a meteor,The April 22, 1966 sighting involved three widely separated objects alternately glowing red and white, visible for about one minute,The observers included a 24-year-old US Navy enlisted member and two students, all with excellent reliability ratings,The moving object in the April 22 sighting left a trail similar to a fireworks rocket,The stationary objects remained visible for approximately 30 minutes before observers lost interest.
sighted object: one object (possibly a meteor) and three glowing objects (red and white)
witness description: two students and a US Navy enlisted member, all with excellent reliability ratings
